title: Faculty of Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics For JEE(Main + Adv, UG-NEET
jobDescription:
Faculty of Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics & Biology

Shall be responsible for effectively delivering the curriculum as per the syllabus for JEE (Main + Advanced), UG- NEET, BIT-SAT, MHT-CET, 12th Boards (State & CBSE), etc. Shall be responsible for the overall performance & improvement of each student.

Roles & Responsibilities:

  • Simplify the content & make it interesting so that students develop a learning curve & score good marks.
  • Prepare lesson materials, grade papers, manage the classroom, and evaluate and give feedback to students.
  • Measure progress and accomplishments of students towards their academic achievements on a regular basis and provide progress reports as required.
  • Provide a safe, thriving, and respectful environment for all students in the classroom and on the academys campus.
  • Mentoring weak students, inspiring rankers to achieve full marks, see that students develop a habit according to their respective boards of writing the papers.

Highlights: To develop curriculum and lesson plans, and present those lessons to their students, in groups or individually (during doubts). They should track the progress of their students and create reports to inform the institute about their progress. Teachers are responsible for maintaining a safe and respectful classroom environment in order to optimize student capabilities and develop their love of learning. We are looking to hire a talented Teacher to join our existing top-notch team. If you're excited to be part of a winning team, Synergy Academy is a great company for you. Apply now!


Preferred candidate profile

The candidate must be Graduate /Post Graduate with subject specialization and adequate experience of teaching. Candidates opting for Chemistry Faculty must also specify Organic / Inorganic / Physical / All as their area of expertise.


Perks and benefits

Salary: Best in industry, depending on experience & last drawn.


Selection procedure: Written test, Subject discussion & Student demo.

Immediate Joining.


Job Location: Navi Mumbai (Kharghar, Nerul, Panvel, Airoli) & Central Mumbai (Thane, Mulund, Dombivali)


Interested candidates can WhatsApp your updated resume to HR Team on +91 7304724767, or email us on hr@synergyacademy.co.in

title: iOS Developer - IT Consulting MNC - Pune (Viman Nagar)
jobDescription:
Role : IOS Developer


Responsibilities:

  • Design and develop iOS applications using Objective-C or Swift.
  • Utilise frameworks such as UIKit and SwiftUI to create intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces.
  • Adhere to Apple's design principles and interface guidelines to deliver a seamless user experience.
  • Integrate iOS applications with back-end services through RESTful APIs.
  • Write unit tests and conduct UI testing to ensure the reliability and stability of the applications.
  • Utilize performance and memory tuning tools to optimise application performance.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement new features and enhancements.
  • Use code versioning tools such as Git and participate in code reviews to maintain code quality and consistency.
  • Stay up to date with the latest iOS development trends, tools, and technologies.

Essential skills/experience

  • Proficiency in Objective-C / Swift
  • Experience in developing iOS applications using frameworks like UIKit, SwiftUI, etc.
  • Understanding of Apple's design principles and interface guidelines.
  • Experience working with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services.
  • Ability to write unit tests and experience with UI testing frameworks.
  • Experience with performance and memory tuning tools.
  • Proficient in using code versioning tools such as Git and participating in code reviews.
  • Strong collaboration and innovation skills, with a passion for working in a team environment.

Desired skills/experience

  • Experience withÂ CI/CD processes
  • Experience in building cloud-hosted services at scale
  • Experience with CoreData, CoreAnimation.
  • Understanding of mobile app architectural patterns (MVC, MVVM, etc.).
  • Experience with Agile methodologies.
  • Experience in Android development using Kotlin
